page.title: 16Junior Football,Leamington
page.content: AP football club has three teams the under 10's,13's & 14's this is because the under 12's dropped out of the league & the under 11's changed their name to Whitnash Hardware.They are all good teams.AP stands for Automotive Products and AP junior football club plays in AP's grounds which is next to the factory.AP also have a semi profesional team which is in the Southern League. Whitnash Hardware, formerly AP Under 11's won the league last year.If you win the league you get a cup and all the players in the winning team and the runners up get a medal each. This is taken home to be kept. Trophys are only kept for one year before being returned and then tried to win & take home again.Sometimes they take you to Wembley to see the England youth team for about Â£6,00.
